MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:45pm due to emergency tree cutting being required between Millburn Cottage and the Sewage Works and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:18pm on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
